website_summaries.verdict: This stroller folds a bit more compactly than similar strollers.
pros: Handle can be adjusted for height
Seat and canopy can be removed to create a lightweight infant car-seat carrier
Includes an infant car seat, but can also work with other Graco infant car seats
Child's arm bar can be removed in the front
cons: This model is more expensive than some other Graco models

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Unlike their other strollers, it is not one hand open/close like it says. You must un clip and pull apart with both hands to open. The one hand pull from the middle takes at least 10 attempts before working. Haven't even hand it a year yet and it already squeaks and steers funny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I love the stroller but it is very heavy and hard to lug. On the other hand it is very sturdy. The car seat is nice too. The only difference i have noticed between this one and past ones I have owned, is that it won’t click on to a cart so it has to be set in the bottom part (basket) leaving very little room for groceries. Overall, I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best baby shower present
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my best friends first baby and she loves it. Perfect for those new moms that need something that’s fancy but inexpensive. The color is beautiful and you will be able to spot your stroller anyplace anytime
customer_reviews.author: ccorra6

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my son. It's a great product and the price on amazon can't be beat. Can't comment on it's durability as I'm not the one using it and it's only been a couple of months. This is a real review!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great value, easy to use and fold
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller, very well made and super easy to collapse store in trunk. Car seat fits perfectly in the stroller as well
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Miracle

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Given that I had a c section it wasn't the best for traveling. But now that I'm all better, its awesome. Works great for "off roading" or walks, runs, anything for out doors. The basket hold soo much we love packing it especially when we go to theme parks. The carseat it also awesome. It held our preemie baby of 6lbs to now 21 lbs and he still fits. Absolutely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: C y S Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: They see me rollllllin'
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a baby shower gift for my niece. It's a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Eden E

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and good looking set.
customer_reviews.text: Is a very good combo, I love the stroller and the car seat is very light to carry.. great deal..
customer_reviews.author: bianca yanez

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated that the tires keep going flat!
customer_reviews.text: The tires keep popping. We have only had it 3 months and we have gotten the tires repaired 4 times already.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Marshall

customer_reviews.title: traveler system
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together.Shopped around and so far am Happy with my decision to purchase this traveler system.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: A little on the heavy side but the car seat is 10x safer than any other car seat I’ve used, in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Good and worth the  $$$
customer_reviews.text: Great product, now just waiting on baby to get here.
customer_reviews.author: Isaura Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Happy overall
customer_reviews.text: This is the first stroller we've ever gotten. The front wheel swivels a bit, but other than that it is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob and Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth. Easy to use, solid. Like both the car seat and stroller
customer_reviews.author: absolutstarynght

customer_reviews.title: I gave this as a gift to my daughter at ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my daughter at her baby shower who lives out of state. She assembled the stroller only to find out the stroller is broke. She is contacting Graco.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Horoschak

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller/ car seat combo
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter and liked it so much bought another one for a family friend!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy R Ploesch

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandchild and it's easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine A. Bjonskaas

customer_reviews.title: Smooth ride!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I’ve taken it for a stroll at my local park and mall, so far my baby loves it, it rides very smooth. While it isn’t very light, it’s manageable and I’ve been able to load it onto my husband f150 with no help.
customer_reviews.author: VRami

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful smooth ride, sensible storage
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this stroller and it steers like a dream! It's a bit chubby when folded but it's ok in the car, the one second fold is ALL TRUE and my lord it's a smooth ride. Plenty of space for bags in the undercarriage. Nice height on the bar if you are tall (I'm 6') but it can also adjust down. I love that it stands up on its own when you fold it, and you can wheel it around when folded really easily.
customer_reviews.author: meepmeep

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and Sturdy Stroller / Baby Seat Combo
customer_reviews.text: There area lot of stroller/car seat combos on the market so it can be a little tough to pick one. I went through two mistakes first. My first one had had plastic tires which wore out very quickly. Then I bought a Schwinn stroller that had bike-like tires but it was too huge to use with my Subaru Forester. So this Grayco RoadMaster is a great combination. [PRO] [+] Accepts all Graco Click Connect baby seats [+] Super easy to fold up [+] Adjustable as baby grows [+] Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.author: @TrevorHikes

customer_reviews.title: BAD CUSTOMER SERVICE AND PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This stroller does not fold up and customer service will not get back to us!!!
customer_reviews.author: jm

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: This item was hard for me to review because after testing the stroller and its features, I don't use some of them. For example, in one click, you can "flatten" it for travel, but we leave it ready to go out the door and haven't transported it in the car. The infant insert will hold a little one from 4 to 30 pounds, which is nice. The tires are rubber and very sturdy but smooth riding for my grandson. This is the best jogging stroller we've ever had. We especially appreciate the quality and when the time comes to stow it away, we will appreciate the storage size.
customer_reviews.author: K K Schwartz

product_meta.title: Graco Roadmaster Jogger Travel System | Includes Roadmaster Jogging Stroller and SnugRide SnugLock 30 Infant Car Seat, Drift
product_meta.description: Color:DriftThe Graco Road Master Jogger is the ultimate crossover stroller, combining all the comfort and convenience features of a traditional jogging stroller while being more compact. This jogging stroller travel system folds 20% more compact than Graco's current Fast Action Jogger. It is also loaded with features like the one-second, one-hand Fast Action fold bringing the ultimate in convenience to a jogger. Click Connect technology allows for a one-step, secure connection of infant car seat to stroller.
feature_bullets: Folds 20% more compact than the current Graco FastAction Jogger
Removable stroller seat converts stroller into lightweight, portable infant car seat carrier
Accepts all Graco Click Connect infant car seats with a secure one-step attachment to create your own travel system. Use the stroller from day 1 with your infant car seat.
Graco's signature Fast Action one-second, one-hand fold provides the ultimate in convenience for parents on the go
Stroller stands when folded for easy storage.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars11 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
